com.redhat.rhn.common.messaging

Class SmtpMail

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.redhat.rhn.common.messaging.SmtpMail
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Mail

    public class SmtpMail
extends java.lang.Object
implements Mail
    A simple wrapper around javamail to allow us to send e-mail quickly.

    • Constructor Summary

      SmtpMail()
